name: Pgl
wishText: I hope iske baad tera mood sahi rahega thoda ;)
textInChatBox: Happy 21st birthday to you!! and on this day....
text3: Pr ye thoda sa boring hojaata na?
text4: Isiliye maine socha kuch aur krte hai
outroText: Chal phir, wpis aa aur tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
